function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased economic support may lead to complacency in adhering to public health guidelines, leading to a higher risk of contagion."},{"name":"Potential increase in fraud due to the large-scale distribution of funds and economic support."},{"name":"Large financial aid packages may encourage increased public spending and economic activity, potentially leading to a higher risk of disease transmission in the community."},{"name":"Relaxed budget policies may lead to a lack of financial resources for long-term public health infrastructure and preparedness, creating vulnerability to future disease outbreaks."},{"name":"Large-scale financial aid aims to support businesses and affected individuals, but may inadvertently lead to economic disparities, potentially exacerbating social determinants of health and widening health inequities."},{"name":"Cancellation and postponement of scientific conferences"},{"name":"Impact on financial markets and global economy"},{"name":"Impact of school closures on families and economic costs"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on research community"},{"name":"Delays in upscaling production in chemical manufacturing companies"},{"name":"Closures of educational institutions due to covid-19"},{"name":"Viral outbreak impacting global economy"},{"name":"Disruption to manufacturing businesses"},{"name":"Travel restrictions and social distancing impacting availability of inspectors and delivery staff"},{"name":"Shutting down of floor trading impacting commodity exchange"},{"name":"Low levels of animal pharmaceuticals from large drug suppliers"},{"name":"Covid-19 outbreak and its impact on global healthcare systems"},{"name":"Enforced border shutdowns, travel restrictions, and quarantine"},{"name":"Global crash in demand for agricultural commodities"},{"name":"Potential spread of sars-cov-2 through the handling of waste materials from households and quarantine facilities with covid-19 patients."},{"name":"Lack of data on sars-cov-2 prevalence and persistence in wastewater, hindering informed risk management actions for the wastewater sector."},{"name":"Potential aerosol transmission of covid-19, similar to previous outbreaks like sars-cov, necessitating further research and risk management actions."},{"name":"Risk of novel rna viruses presenting a serious threat to global public health and disease control"},{"name":"Potential vulnerabilities in waste and wastewater management due to widespread community infection and quarantining"},{"name":"Unknown variability in sars-cov-2 viral shedding rates between people and within people at different stages of infection."},{"name":"Potential for inaccurate detection of sars-cov-2 re-emergence or presence/absence through wastewater monitoring."},{"name":"Lack of widely-accepted surveillance system for detecting the potential community presence of covid-19 through wastewater monitoring."},{"name":"Possible faecal-oral transmission of sars-cov-2"},{"name":"Unpublished data on infectious sars-cov-2 in
